title: Strategy Creation
heading: Create Strategy
description: Use any indicator you want, follow trends or price action, and build your strategy algorithm.
bullets: Create an algorithm that detects buy/sell zones and translate it into code.
Use optional indicator settings to find the most profitable parameters in backtests.
You can later edit or delete the strategies you've created.

title: Trading Bots
heading: Automated Trading Bots
description: Connect your strategies to bots and automate trading without manual tracking.
bullets: Translate your strategy into code from the creation page.
Start the bot on strategies with successful backtest results to begin profiting.
